subject: Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) — Big air, the Flying Tomato and a whole lot of medieval garb will be featured at the United States Open Snowboarding Championships at Stratton Mountain.
snippet: MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) — Big air, the Flying Tomato and a whole lot of medieval garb will be featured at the United States Open Snowboarding Championships at Stratton Mountain.
